explains: adj. 革命的；革命性的，突破性的
wordGroup: revolutionary war n. 美国之革命战争

sentences.en: The country was in the throes of revolutionary change.
sentences.cn: 国家正处于革命动荡中。

sentences.en: She ran away with him to Mexico and espoused the revolutionary cause.
sentences.cn: 她与他一起逃到了墨西哥，支持革命事业。

sentences.en: This revolutionary expansion required energetic nation-building policies.
sentences.cn: 这次革命性扩张需要有积极的国家建设政策。
